property.name: text
property.value:
Swarm acoustic service (sas) demo using accessors. The service receives sensor data from an Android app that can be downloaded at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.longle1.spectrogram.
Author: Long Le University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign

property.name: text
property.value: Use the database service to get the raw audio data. Note: data is received correctly, but the audio is corrupted because FileWriter writes strings, not binary data.

property.name: text
property.value: Use the query service to search for audio events and rank them.

property.name: text
property.value: Use a speech recognition service to automatically find the transcription of the 1st audio event.

property.name: script
description
property.value: This accessor, when fired, makes a query to the SAS service.

entity.doc: Create a constant sequence with a string value.
